manifest.name: Agent - OpenAI Agents SDK
manifest.description: A conversational agent backend and UI using OpenAI Agents SDK and MLflow AgentServer

resource_specs.name: experiment
resource_specs.description: The destination experiment for traces from the agent's execution.

manifest.name: Agent - LangGraph
manifest.description: A conversational agent backend and UI using LangGraph and MLflow AgentServer

resource_specs.name: experiment
resource_specs.description: The destination experiment for traces from the agent's execution.

manifest.name: Chat UI
manifest.description: Create a chat UI that queries a remote agent endpoint or foundation model.

resource_specs.name: serving-endpoint
resource_specs.description: The Databricks Model Serving endpoint hosting the LLM or agent that powers the app's responses.

manifest.name: Chatbot
manifest.description: A basic chatbot application integrated with an LLM hosted on Databricks Model Serving.

resource_specs.name: serving-endpoint
resource_specs.description: The Databricks Model Serving endpoint hosting the LLM that powers the app's responses (e.g., 'Meta Llama 3.3 70B Instruct' or any chat-compatible foundation model).

manifest.name: Data app
manifest.description: A starter dashboard application which queries data in Unity Catalog with a SQL Warehouse.

resource_specs.name: sql-warehouse
resource_specs.description: The SQL warehouse the app uses to query data.

manifest.name: Data app
manifest.description: A starter dashboard application which queries data in Unity Catalog with a SQL Warehouse using the app user's permissions.

resource_specs.name: sql-warehouse
resource_specs.description: The SQL warehouse the app uses to query data.

manifest.name: Lakebase Postgres app
manifest.description: A basic todo application which stores tasks in a postgres database hosted on Databricks.

resource_specs.name: database
resource_specs.description: The database the app uses to store and retrieve todo tasks.

manifest.name: MCP Server - Hello World
manifest.description: A basic MCP server.

manifest.name: MCP Server - OpenAPI Spec
manifest.description: Make any REST API usable by agents by wrapping it in an MCP server. Deploys an MCP server that exposes REST API operations from an OpenAPI specification stored in a Unity Catalog volume.

resource_specs.name: uc-volume
resource_specs.description: The Unity Catalog volume where your OpenAPI specification file (spec.json) is stored.

manifest.name: Non-Conversational Agent
manifest.description: A non-conversational GenAI agent that processes structured financial document questions and provides yes/no answers with detailed reasoning.

resource_specs.name: experiment
resource_specs.description: The experiment that the agent uses to trace the agent's execution.
